B

Borough - Class in com.example.sip
Borough is an object containing information for one of the thirty two boroughs of London....In total thirty two instances of a Borough are going to be used in the execution of the program.
Borough(int, String, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float) - Constructor for class com.example.sip.Borough
Borough constructor
boroughArray - Variable in class com.example.sip.LondonMapActivity
This list contains all the boroughs instances

This array list contains Boroughs that are results of the previous activities and passed on as extra using the intent
boroughArray - Variable in class com.example.sip.WelcomeActivity
An array list that its purpose is to store all the boroughs when they are retrieved from the database

BoroughStore - Class in com.example.sip
Borough Store is an object where all the instances of boroughs are stored in an array list.
